Mexican physicist graduated from the Science College, UNAM, with experience in numerical methods and computational modeling applied to scientific research, especially in controlled nuclear fusion and fluid mechanics. Familiar with experimental data analysis, technological automation, and high programming performance in Linux/Unix environments. Language management like Python, C++, Julia, SQL and CUDA. Fan of electronics, tennis lover and writer in his free time. Mathematics, physics and computing teacher with more than 4 years of experience. Passionate about scientific dissemination and interdisciplinary work.
